scripts.bash: docker build --build-arg USER_ID=$(id -u) --build-arg GROUP_ID=$(id -g) -f Dockerfile -t polar . && docker run -v $(pwd):/polar-app:delegated -w /polar-app -u $(id -u ${USER}):$(id -g ${USER}) -e WEBPACK_BUNDLE=repository -p 8050:8050 -ti --rm --init --ulimit memlock=819200000:819200000 polar bash
scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap && find node_modules -type l -name 'polar*' -exec rm '{}' ';' && lerna link
scripts.bootstrap-ci: lerna bootstrap --ci && find node_modules -type l -name 'polar*' -exec rm '{}' ';' && lerna link
scripts.rebuild: yarn run purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && lerna run compile
scripts.dist-build: yarn run purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && yarn run lerna-run-compile && yarn run lerna-run-dist
scripts.do-release-webapp: yarn run dist-publish && lerna run --concurrency=1 --parallel=false dist-release
scripts.do-release-init: yarn run dist-clean && yarn run purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && yarn run lerna-run-compile
scripts.dist-release-publish: yarn run dist-prepare && yarn run dist-build && yarn run dist-publish
scripts.dist-release-webapp: yarn run set-registry-verdaccio && lerna bootstrap && lerna run compile && lerna run test && lerna run publish && (cd packages/polar-app-private/polar-webapp-dist && yarn run dist) && (cd packages/polar-app-private/polar-hooks && yarn run dist-release)
scripts.dist-release-webapp-init: lerna bootstrap && lerna run compile && lerna run test && (cd packages/polar-app-private/polar-webapp-dist && yarn run dist)
scripts.dist-release-linux: yarn run do-release-init && yarn run do-release-linux
scripts.dist-release-win: yarn run do-release-init && yarn run do-release-win
scripts.dist-release-macos: yarn run do-release-init && yarn run do-release-macos
scripts.purge-node-modules: rm -rf node_modules && npx lerna exec --concurrency=1 --parallel=false -- rm -rf node_modules
